1118068719593381888.text:
This apparently well sourced French news report in the last hour confirms:

ALL THREE OF THE ROSACE WINDOWS SURVIVED.
The organ suffered severe damage, but contrary to what the church said last night, was not destroyed.https://www.bfmtv.com/culture/notre-dame-de-paris-les-vitraux-des-rosaces-intacts-l-orgue-epargne-par-les-flammes-1674129.html …

1118036427730759680.text: Heartening photograph taken in the last hour this morning showing at least once of the Rosaces intact (although likely damaged).pic.twitter.com/gUrvhggq5H

1117894472002490368.text: #BREAKING Notre-Dame's main structure is "saved and preserved" after fire, says Paris fire officialpic.twitter.com/IC8fT7s593

1117865170066341891.text: I know it’s no consolation at all but the ND spire was a 19th century restoration by Viollet- le-Duc; much damaged original taken down in reign of Louis XVI ; medieval glass partly restored but would be the biggest tragic casualty

1117847891173789696.text: I took a survey course of Catholic cathedral architecture taught by a remarkably cynical former priest and on the first day of class he was like “of cathedrals have multiple dates for different parts, burning down is an essential part of the life cycle of Catholic architecture.”

1126231820780101633.text: I wish that had come against a way less lovable team who really didn't deserve to have their hearts ripped out like that.

1125801996831862784.text:
6. Garnish player salaries to subsidized new stadium construction
7. Alcohol prohibited within 1000 yards of home plate
8. Catchers cannot be in foul territory
9. If it bounces off the garage it's a ground-rule double
10. Miami Marlins automatic World Series berth

1125799288817291265.text:
1. DH for the National League, but no DH for the American League
2. Automatic instant replay on every called ball or strike
3. Seven All-Star games per year. Minimum one per calendar month. 
4. Home runs are now outs. 
5. No more hats.https://twitter.com/Brandon_Warne/status/1125448040960221185 …

1117876260892364802.text: I'll leave on a more wistful note than that. I went down to Notre Dame on Christmas Night. It was lovely. Was the last time.pic.twitter.com/THStbdUHzq

1117873388121313281.text: Welp Notre Dame is already a culture war skirmish line, and InfoWars false flag conspiracy theories are in the air, so I guess it's Log Off O'clock for me.

1117844147635990530.text: I really don't know what to say. I'm watching Notre Dame burn down from my window.

1114159446735892482.text: Don't worry I'll live tweet everyone's Ultimate Fate

1114158826096353280.text: I absolutely just booked a ticket to see it opening day. So...I just spent a couple months catching up on movies most of you have been following for a stone cold decade. And I'm gonna see the finale before all of you. Aint that a kick in the pants?pic.twitter.com/1hsQvP1FFo

1114156232804327425.text: I also just got back from seeing Captain Marvel. It was very good!

1113462732202889216.text: Time for a poll. What crucial characteristic does Hamill's Joker have that other recent portrayals of Joker lack?

1113460213657624576.text: One thing I can say for sure: Mark Hamill's claim to being the best Joker does not appear in any way threatened.

1113458763019821056.text: While I'm here I may as well say that the Joker trailer looks amaaaaaaaazing. Tons of fun for the whole family.

1113455860595007488.text: You take your mind off the shitshow of Brexit politics by coming down and listening to an uplifting discussion about [checks notes] the moral and political collapse of a once mighty republic. Oh.
